item.description:
You guys know how much I love the Ellie Fund and it is Breast Cancer Awareness Month......

In a celebration of pink to support Breast Cancer Awareness month, Circle Furniture invites you to join us for a night of pink furniture, pink cocktails and hors d'oeuvres, pink fashions, pink vespas, mini-golf on pink sands and much more!

Get in the pink for your chance to win fabulous raffle prizes including a free stay at one of Fairmont Bermuda's two luxurious resorts, "winner's choice."

All proceeds benefit The Ellie Fund, a non-profit organization that aids families in the fight against breast cancer and helps ease its effects on women and families across Massachusetts. (sorry for the $20 ticket but it is for a good cause!!!!)

Check it out at....... http://www.circlefurn...
item.name: The Pink Party.....its for Boys too!!!!
